name: Config 2022 Name Badge
description:
Connecting with other attendees is one of the most fun parts of Config! At a virtual event, that can be a bit harder to do—so that’s why we created this fun name badge activity. They tell everyone who you are, what you’re into, and what you want to talk about!


Don’t forget to publish your name badge as a remix, add it to your conference profile and share on social with the hashtag #Config2022!
